fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Every night you may call another player on the phone creating a private channel between the two of you

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Your call counts as an astral visit
- Roleblock, control, and redirect immune
- If your targetâ€™s role is part of a good faction you will be informed of anything that happened to them last night (all mod messages not related to their role)
- If your target is a neutral or part of an evil faction they may choose any mod messages for you to see that they received
